text.BitTorrent is the company behind the lar: BitTorrent is the company behind the largest decentralized P2P protocol for distributing files over the Internet. Our team doesn’t just create products. We create technologies that contribute to a more decentralized Internet, powered by the people.
text.Our products are available across two br: Our products are available across two brands, BitTorrent (https://www.bittorrent.com) and µTorrent (https://www.utorrent.com). With over 100 million active users, BitTorrent offers both desktop-based and browser-based torrent programs for Windows and Mac, as well as mobile torrent downloaders for Android available on Google Play.
text.In June of 2018, BitTorrent was acquired: In June of 2018, BitTorrent was acquired by TRON, one of the largest blockchain protocols for decentralized applications. Sharing a combined mission to create a decentralized Internet, BitTorrent is introducing blockchain into its existing products and creating new products with decentralized DNA. Come help us build a better Internet.
